name: Wizard
description: Scholars of the arcane who wield spells through rigorous study and a spellbook.
hp_at_higher_levels: 1d6 (or 4) + your Constitution modifier per Wizard level after 1st

1.name: Arcane Recovery
1.description: Once per day after a short rest, recover expended spell slots with a combined level equal to or less than half your wizard level (rounded up) and none above 5th.

1.name: Spellcasting
1.description: You prepare and cast wizard spells using Intelligence; your spellbook holds the spells you know, and you can cast rituals and use an arcane focus.

2.name: Arcane Tradition
2.description: Choose an arcane tradition, gaining subclass features at 2nd, 6th, 10th, and 14th levels.

3.name: Cantrip Formulas
3.description: After a long rest, you can replace one wizard cantrip you know with another from the wizard spell list.

4.name: Ability Score Improvement
4.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1; alternatively take a feat.

6.name: Arcane Tradition feature
6.description: You gain a feature from your chosen Arcane Tradition.

18.name: Spell Mastery
18.description: Choose a 1st- and a 2nd-level wizard spell in your spellbook to cast at will without expending spell slots.

20.name: Signature Spells
20.description: Choose two 3rd-level spells as signature spells; always prepared and each can be cast once without a slot per short or long rest.
